title: Inside Training | Getting ready for derby day
body_text:
As we approach our second north London derby of the season, our cameras have been at London Colney taking a look at the preparations inside the camp.
We head to Tottenham on Sunday aiming to complete our first league double over our neighbours since 2013/14, as well as maintain our five-point advantage at the top of the table.
And as you can see from the footage, Mikel Arteta and our players are fully focused on the task in hand, as they aim to replicate October's derby day success and bring more happiness to Gooners across the globe.
Press play on the video above to see how the squad is shaping up.
